meanings.definition: A device consisting of a rotating sphere powered by steam, used as a demonstration of the principles of jet propulsion.
meanings.sent1: The aeolipile spun rapidly when steam was applied.
meanings.sent2: The scientist explained how the aeolipile works to the students.
meanings.sent3: During the science fair, the aeolipile amazed the audience with its spinning motion.
meanings.sent4: The aeolipile was like a tiny steam-powered dancer twirling on stage.
meanings.sent5: The gleaming aeolipile whirled like a miniature tornado in the classroom.

meanings.definition: A type of ancient steam engine.
meanings.sent1: Archaeologists discovered an aeolipile in the ruins of an ancient civilization.
meanings.sent2: The museum displayed the ancient aeolipile alongside other historical artifacts.
meanings.sent3: The ancient engineer proudly presented his latest invention, the aeolipile, to the king.
meanings.sent4: The aeolipile from centuries past whispered stories of innovation and progress.
meanings.sent5: The ancient aeolipile chugged and hissed like a sleeping dragon in the museum.
